meanings.definition: A psychological or emotional difficulty or inhibition.
meanings.sent1: Her hangups about public speaking made her nervous.
meanings.sent2: His hangups about his past prevented him from moving forward.
meanings.sent3: She tried to overcome her hangups by practicing in front of a mirror.
meanings.sent4: His hangups were like heavy chains holding him back from reaching his full potential.
meanings.sent5: The weight of her hangups felt like a burden on her shoulders.

meanings.definition: A source of mental or emotional difficulty or inhibition.
meanings.sent1: His fear of failure was one of his biggest hangups.
meanings.sent2: The criticism from others became a hangup for her self-confidence.
meanings.sent3: Trying to hide his hangups only made them more obvious to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The unresolved issues from his childhood were his biggest hangups.
meanings.sent5: Her hangups were like roadblocks on the path to happiness.
